column5: Has this ever happened to you?  http://www.edmontonsun.com/news/weird/2011/01/17/16926021.html
.....  the youth of today... years ago it would have been SAFE to allow her to sleep .. today you would be charged...
man.....that happens to me all the time..... in my DREAMS !!!!!!!!!!!!1
Gay or ugly... not that there's anything wrong with that...
The girl or the guy?  That could apply to either one.
In three, two, one. Goodnight OFC.
What no pics?   Wonder if they guy plans on paying back the favour?
So we all make mistakes from time to time...he had to call the police...

He did the right thing. When she woke up in the morning,embarrassed and confused she might have called the police and accused him of something that would cost him losts of money on a lawyer.  Next: How many of you guy's clicked on the sunshine girl? I did not cause i dont like little black dresses.
Wow...now thats funny!  I wonder....After reading this article, How many single dudes will go to bed tonight leaving their doors unlocked???
Wait there was a sunshine girl too! awesome, back I go...lol
Sounds like the staff housing where I used to work out west
lol, my buddy actually went in the wrong house one nite after a few.... dozen... drinks.. and was promptly arrested too lol. ahhh good times

l could only wish...lol l had some drunk guy walk right by me while l was laying on the couch watching tv never seen the guy before. He went and passed out on my bed..so l called the cops 3 hrs later they show up..mean while im freaked out standing outside waiting on the cops..lol guess l should have locked my door...lol

Something like this happened at my house 20 some years ago. Only it was a guy and he only made it to the top of the stairs before he found himself quickly at the bottom after a good heave ho. I felt sorry for him after I found out he lived in the house one block away. He was pretty badly bruised but nothing broken.  And yes, he was at his sisters wedding dance at the local Legion hall.
